rows.label: tlk44500188_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Wonder if you know about the
large icicles in Colt Ravine?

rows.label: tlk44500188_04_msg0002
rows.name:
They're known for falling
and causing avalanches.

rows.label: tlk44500188_04_msg0003
rows.name:
There was one just 3 years ago.
Another when I was just a boy.
I lost my grandpa in it.

rows.label: tlk44500188_04_msg0004
rows.name:
It'd be better if someone could
knock 'em down, so they wouldn't
pose such a risk, but...

rows.label: tlk44500188_04_msg0005
rows.name:
the Luxurian army doesn't
have any manpower to spare.

rows.label: tlk44500188_04_msg0006
rows.name:
We'll just have to wait till they've
taken care of what they need to.

rows.label: tlk44500188_04_msg0007
rows.name: Oh, you'll have a word with them?

rows.label: tlk44500188_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Hope now they won't cause
any more suffering.
